CustomField.fullName: AA_AccessText__c</fullName false Consolidate the fields for API access, Extraction access and Online access false SUBSTITUTE( IF(APIAccess__c ,"Integrert oppslag(API), ",NULL) + IF(ExtractionAccess__c ,"Uttrekk, ",NULL)+ IF(OnlineAccess__c ,"Web-oppslag, ",NULL)+ IF(EventAccess__c,"Hendelser ",NULL)+ "", ", ",.", NULL) AA_AccessText false false false Text false
